content: As an AI language model, I cannot predict the future or make any assumptions about Katy Perry's career choices. However, it's worth noting that many artists often experiment with different genres and styles throughout their careers. Katy Perry has shown versatility in her music over the years, and it's possible that she may continue to explore various music genres in the future. She may even return to her gospel roots at some point or incorporate elements from it into her pop music. Ultimately, it's up to Katy Perry to decide which direction she wants to take in her career, and her fans will undoubtedly support her regardless of her musical style.
